text: Zydus Wellness (founded as Carnation Nutra-Analogue Foods) is an Indian consumer goods company headquartered in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. It is a subsidiary of pharmaceutical company Cadila Healthcare. Zydus is a producer of nutrition and skincare products under brands such as EverYuth, Sugar Free, Nutralite and Actilife. In 2019, Zydus acquired Kraft Heinz's subsidiary Heinz India for , picking up the latter's consumer product brands including Complan, Glucon-D, Nycil and Sampriti Ghee. During the COVID-19 pandemic, Zydus Wellness entered the hand sanitiser segment and stated that hand sanitiser products will be part of its portfolio even after the pandemic. ==References== Category:Food and drink companies of India Category:Cosmetics companies of India Category:Manufacturing companies established in 1994 Category:Health care companies of India Category:Companies based in Ahmedabad
